channel.title: Coord command and object ids?
channel.description:
The client I'm using doesn't show the item/object ids when I right click them is there anyway to add that? The reason I want it is so when I'm deleting objects/making shops with items I don't have to go though a list to try to find each one.
Also my server doesn't have the ::coords command it's based off delta am I missing it? if not do you have the code?
Thanks

item.title: Coord command and object ids?
item.dc:creator: @z_rowt21 z rowt21
item.description:
@z_rowt21 wrote:

Once you find the correct teleport coords search it in client.java and clickingbuttons.java and see if there are multiple teles if not idk

Read full topic

item.title: Coord command and object ids?
item.dc:creator: @zrickz zrickz
item.description:
@zrickz wrote:

Thanks a lot it was mypos haha my bad, I have one quick question you may be able to answer. For my home/teleports it doesn’t teleport to the exact coords like it’ll teleport to the coord or the few blocks around it is there anyway to make it teleport to the exact coords every time? I’m having a hard time changing the teleport coords because of this.

Read full topic

item.title: Coord command and object ids?
item.dc:creator: @z_rowt21 z rowt21
item.description:
@z_rowt21 wrote:

I dont have an answer to ur first question but have u tried ::mypos for the Coordinates?
